thread.title: Cloud services help Amazon post surprise Q2 profit
thread.title_full: Cloud services help Amazon post surprise Q2 profit

title: Cloud services help Amazon post surprise Q2 profit
text:
Cloud services help Amazon post surprise Q2 profit 
Times Of India Friday 23rd October, 2015 
Cloud computing is the fastest growing business for Amazon, and the new services in which it is investing will help it capitalize on rising demand to store and manage large amounts of information....
